title: CI/CD Pipeline
prompt:
Create a CI/CD pipeline for [PROJECT TYPE]:

Details:
- Repository: [GitHub/GitLab]
- Platform: [GitHub Actions/GitLab CI]
- Deployment: [AWS/GCP/Azure]

Pipeline Stages:
1. Build: Dependencies, artifacts, Docker image
2. Test: Linting, unit tests, integration tests, coverage
3. Quality Gates: Coverage threshold, security scanning
4. Deployment: Dev, staging, production
5. Post-Deployment: Smoke tests, monitoring

Provide complete configuration files and documentation.
example: CI/CD for Node.js API with AWS deployment
